Filmic Tonemapping

Source: R/render_tonemap.R
render_tonemap.Rd

Applies a filmic tonemapping operator to an HDR image in linear RGB.

render_tonemap(
  image = NULL,
  method = "aces",
  exposure = 0,
  reinhard_key = 0.18,
  reinhard_white = NULL,
  desaturate = 0,
  clamp_output = TRUE,
  preserve_alpha = TRUE,
  filename = NULL,
  preview = FALSE
)

Arguments

image

Default NULL. 3-layer RGB/4-layer RGBA array, rayimg class, or filename of an image.

method

Default aces. Tonemapper to apply. Options: aces, hable (a.k.a. uncharted2), reinhard.

exposure

Default 0. Exposure offset in stops (pre-tonemap). Final scale is 2^exposure.

reinhard_key

Default 0.18. Key value for method="reinhard" (middle-gray).

reinhard_white

Default NULL. Optional white point (luminance) for method="reinhard". If NULL, uses basic Reinhard without white compression.

desaturate

Default 0. Amount in [0,1] to blend toward grayscale after tonemapping to curb oversaturation.

clamp_output

Default TRUE. Clamp output RGB to [0,1] after tonemapping.

preserve_alpha

Default TRUE. Keep alpha channel unchanged if present.

filename

Default NULL. If provided, write a PNG to this filename (appends .png if needed). Otherwise plot or return.

preview

Default FALSE. Whether to plot the tonemapped image or just return the data.

Value

A rayimg RGBA array with display-ready values (gamma follows input metadata).

Examples

if(run_documentation()){
plot_image(dragon)
}

if(run_documentation()){
render_tonemap(dragon, method = "aces", exposure = 0) |>
 plot_image()
}
#> Error in render_tonemap(dragon, method = "aces", exposure = 0): could not find function "render_tonemap"
if(run_documentation()){
# Hable/Uncharted2 filmic curve
render_tonemap(dragon, method = "hable",exposure=2) |>
 plot_image()
}
#> Error in render_tonemap(dragon, method = "hable", exposure = 2): could not find function "render_tonemap"
if(run_documentation()){
# Reinhard with key/white point controls
render_tonemap(dragon, method = "reinhard", reinhard_key = 0.18, reinhard_white = 10) |>
 plot_image()
}
#> Error in render_tonemap(dragon, method = "reinhard", reinhard_key = 0.18,     reinhard_white = 10): could not find function "render_tonemap"
